Class CachingPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.CachingPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemoryLruCachePolicy
    Deprecated. 
    Use methods based on OptimizedMapLayers instead. Since SDK 2.54.

    public abstract class CachingPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements scala.Serializable
    Defines the logic for creating caching data loaders.

    See also CacheManager.
